alert.note: Alert for Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 3:48PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Wallowa County through 415 PM PDT... At 343 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lostine, or 11 miles west of Enterprise, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Enterprise, Lostine and rural Wallowa County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
